Defining URL:https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/ValueSet/CareConnect-BodySite-1
Version:1.1.0
Name:Care Connect Body Site
Definition:

A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<<442083009 |anatomical or acquired body structure|).

Publisher:HL7 UK
Copyright:

This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

Source Resource:XML / JSON

Care Connect Body Site

A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK with the expression (<<442083009 |anatomical or acquired body structure|).

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = (<<442083009 |anatomical or acquired body structure|)

Expansion

No Expansion for this valueset (not supported by Publication Tooling)
